title: Cheat Skill: “Sleep Learning” ~Heartwarmingly Living the Other World Life~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Androgynous Characters   Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Cheats   Cute Protagonist   Game Elements   Humanoid Protagonist   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Skill Assimilation   Sleeping   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong

description:
In a Fantasy World of Swords and Magics.

Harumi who died from dozing off while driving his bicycle have come to another world with the peerless skill 『Sleep Learning』.

It is the story of Harumi with his life at stake to sleep.>
